item.title: CoD Warzone: All Verdansk Secret Locked Rooms & Codes
item.description:
Season 3 of Warzone’s Black Ops 6 integration may be one to remember, bringing with it a rebuilt version of Verdansk from the ground up, along with a roster of popular weapons from the original Warzone era. The mid-season update is also impressive, opening up various points of interest that were previously inaccessible to all players.

While Season 3 Reloaded didn’t include the opening of Verdansk’s bunkers—something players are eagerly anticipating for a possible Season 4 update—it did introduce a variety of Easter Eggs, both returning and brand new. One such Easter Egg is the reintroduction of locked secret rooms, each of which can be accessed using a unique code. Here is where to find every secret locked room in Verdansk , along with the codes needed to unlock them.

Secret Room Location #1: Farmland

The very first secret loot room that players can find is located at Farmland , just inside the barn on the northwestern side of the POI. Once there, players can interact with the door's keypad and open the room using the code 36158294 without needing to figure out the sequence beforehand, as all codes are simply the old ones from the original version of Verdansk—just reversed this time around.

Secret Room Location #2: Prison

The second locked room that players can find is a wooden shack located west of the Prison. Here, players can interact with the keypad next to the door and open the room using the code 13584927 , granting them access to loot whatever they find inside.

Secret Room Location #3: TV Station

The third and final secret room that players can find is located just east of the TV Station , taking the form of a small brick building. This door can be opened via the keypad using the code 01859472. Upon entering the code, players can open the door and make their way inside to secure some high-tier loot.

What Can Be Found In The Locked Verdansk Loot Rooms?

Within each locked room in Verdansk, players can find a guaranteed Legendary Supply Crate, along with a few other Supply Crates for some seriously good loot. This makes each room an excellent drop location for solos looking to get a hold of Legendary weapons and even Armor Vests, especially considering that once players know the codes, they can land at each room at the start of the game and open them straight away. However, there may not be enough loot to go around for those playing as a squad of three or four.

Call of Duty: Warzone
9 /10

item.title: Oblivion Remastered: The Wayward Knight Quest Walkthrough
item.description:
Oblivion Remastered has several major factions and a few minor ones that players can join after completing certain side quests. The Knights of the Thorn is one such minor faction that you can join during the Wayward Knight quest. The quest involves helping out the heir of Cheydinhal, Farwil, inside an Oblivion Gate that spawned outside the city. The outcome of this quest will determine whether players join the Knights of the Thorn and the quest-exclusive rewards that follow.

How to Start The Wayward Knight Quest in Oblivion Remastered

Players must complete the Dagon Shrine main quest to start The Wayward Knight quest.

To start The Wayward Knight quest in Oblivion Remastered , players must travel to the city of Cheydinhal , located to the east of the Imperial City. Once you travel to its West Gate, talk to any of the guards inside the city about Cheydinhal, and they'll share the news of an Oblivion Gate opening up outside the city. This will start The Wayward Knight quest, prompting players to investigate the Oblivion Gate.

Next, you must exit Cheydinhal city through the west gate and keep following the quest marker till you arrive at the Oblivion Gate. You'll talk to another guard here who'll inform players that the heir of Cheydinhal, Farwil, has gone inside the gate to close it. So, players will need to enter the gate and team up with Farwil to close the Gate to Oblivion.

Helping Farwil Shut Down the Oblivion Gate Outside Cheydinhal

Once you enter the Oblivion Gate, keep following the path and eliminate any enemies along the way. You spot several Knights of the Thorn soldiers along the way; try looting them for any good items. Head through The Bowels and into the Realm of Oblivion to meet up with Farwil. After the conversation with Farwil ends, storm the castle and eliminate all enemies along the way.

Players must keep Farwil alive if they want to join the Knights of the Thorn faction and get unique weapons from Count Indarys. In case he dies, players must recover his ring to present to the count to complete The Wayward Knight quest in Oblivion Remastered .

Once inside the castle, keep following the critical quest path and try to eliminate all hostiles before Farwil jumps into combat. It's also important that players keep healing Farwil and his companion with restoration spells that have the "Heal on Touch/Target" effect, like Convalescence​​​​​. Once you reach the Sigillum Sanguis, head to the upper level using the bone-like protrusions on the walls.

Once you activate the Sigil Stone on top, the Oblivion Gate will close, and everyone will teleport outside.

Joining the Knights of the Thorn & Getting Exclusive Rewards

The outcome and rewards of The Wayward Knight quest in Oblivion Remastered depend on whether Farwil escapes the Oblivion Gate alive or dies within . Here are all the rewards players will receive after talking to Count Indarys after closing the Oblivion Gate.

If Farwil escapes the Oblivion Gate alive, players will need to talk to him to become an honorary member of the Knights of the Thorn faction.

Saving Farwil

Become an Honorary Member of the Knights of the Thorn faction

Get either the Staff of Indarys or the Thornblade from Count Indarys

Farwil Dies

400 Gold

Indarys Signet Ring

Knights of the Thorn Medallion (Enchanted)

Knights of the Thorn Shield

Steel Armor Set & Sword

6 Images

item.title: Oblivion Remastered Players Aren't Happy About Claymore Change
item.description:
Summary

  • Some players are upset about the Fine Steel Claymore looking the same as the regular one in Oblivion Remastered.
  • Oblivion Remastered has become one of the best-selling games of 2025, reaching over four million players.
  • Developers are open to feedback and may make changes based on player suggestions to improve the game.

Some Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Remastered players are quite unhappy that the Fine Steel Claymore now looks exactly like the regular one in the game. Oblivion Remastered was, in many ways, a reimagining that pleased even diehard fans of the 2006 title, but some minor details have irked some of those more dedicated to the original game's vibe.

Released last month, Oblivion Remastered was instantly a huge hit, reaching over four million players in a matter of days. A few weeks after its launch, Oblivion Remastered is already among the best-selling games of 2025, only behind Monster Hunter Wilds and Assassin’s Creed Shadows in the US.

Now, an Elder Scrolls fan named Majestic_Address_373 on Reddit has shared a complaint that was backed by many gamers in the Oblivion community. According to them, the Fine Steel Claymore uses the same model as the regular Steel Claymore, which did not happen in the original Oblivion , where it had a “more elegant” design. The community largely agreed with the player, giving the post over 2,300 upvotes. Some gamers even complained that claymores were being nerfed across the board, as their combos are nowhere as powerful as other weapons such as daggers or shortswords, which makes them far less useful than in the original 2006 game.

Oblivion Remastered Players Are Disappointed With How the Fine Steel Claymore Looks

Fortunately, some other changes have pleased old-school Oblivion players. For instance, Oblivion Remastered players praised how cool the new Glass Armor looked, saying that it’s more realistic than the current version of the popular RPG, as the set resembles real-life crystal.

In any case, a few of the changes made by the remaster are fairly controversial with the community. Gamers have complained about Oblivion Remastered missing features from the original, using examples such as the Item menu not having subcategories and local maps being harder to access. Despite these issues, it’s fair to say that the opinions about the title are largely positive among the community.

Fortunately, Bethesda and Virtuos seem dedicated to turning Oblivion Remastered into its best version for fans. A few weeks ago, players spotted that Bethesda was asking for suggestions on how to improve Oblivion Remastered on the game’s Discord channel. This indicates that the developers may still tweak some of the changes made in the popular open-world game, correcting some of these “issues” that are angering part of the fanbase. In any case, it remains to be seen what the next updates will bring to Oblivion Remastered , so gamers can only wait until they learn more.

item.title: Dead by Daylight Crossing Over With Five Nights at Freddy's and The Witcher
item.description:
Summary

  • Dead by Daylight announced plans for crossovers with Five Nights at Freddy's and The Witcher, exciting fans with new content.
  • The FNAF collaboration features Springtrap as a new Killer and a Freddy Fazbear's Pizza map, while the Witcher collection brings skins based on popular characters.
  • Developers also announced a Choose Your Own Adventure-style project for an upcoming chapter and a collection featuring the Boulet Brothers.

Dead by Daylight has announced plans for crossovers with two other major franchises in Five Nights at Freddy's and The Witcher . One of the most popular asymmetrical horror experiences in gaming, Dead by Daylight is no stranger to crossover content, but the announcement of two collaborations with franchises as big as these is nearly unheard of.

In early April, Dead by Daylight launched its crossover with Tokyo Ghoul . The game's version 8.6 update brought anime protagonist Ken Kaneki to the game as a Killer dubbed The Ghoul, terrorizing Survivors with his Kagune Leap special ability and hindering them with his Nothing But Misery hex.

Now, the developers at Behaviour Interactive have revealed plans for the game's future to fans at PAX East, which include Dead by Daylight 's collaboration with Five Nights at Freddy's and The Witcher . The FNAF content is planned as the game's ninth anniversary chapter and will bring the terrifying decayed yellow rabbit animatronic, Springtrap, to the game as a new Killer. Even those who have never dipped into the games may be familiar with Springtrap from the climactic scene in the 2023 film adaptation, and Behaviour revealed that fans have requested Springtrap's addition more than any other outside character. The anniversary chapter will include a Freddy Fazbear's Pizza map, and movie actor Matthew Lillard will be lending his likeness and recorded voice lines to the game.

Dead by Daylight Announces Two Major Collaborations

Along with the FNAF chapter, fans can look forward to the game's upcoming Witcher Collection, which will provide skins for some of the most popular characters from CD Projekt Red's action-RPG franchise. The characters announced for the collaboration, which launches on June 3, include Geralt, Ciri, Yennifer, Triss, and Eredin. Additionally, original Geralt of Rivia voice actor Doug Cockle will be recording new lines for the character to be featured in Dead by Daylight .

Though these collaborations are big news for Dead by Daylight fans, they aren't the only new announcements. Creative Director Dave Richard has announced a Choose Your Own Adventure -style project that developers will be building alongside the fan community. Players will be invited to vote on a new Killer and Survivor's appearance, the chapter's lore, and many other details for an upcoming chapter planned for release in 2026. Additionally, the game is releasing a new collection on July 8 featuring modern-day horror hosts and drag performers the Boulet Brothers, bringing new aesthetic options for The Huntress and The Artist.

Ever wished to play as one of the characters from your favorite horror movies? Dead by Daylight is a 1v4 multiplayer game that draws from all corners of the horror world from a powerful slasher to a terrifying paranormal entity.

Choose between playing an unstoppable Killer and one of 4 Survivors trying to evade a gruesome death. Each character has their own deep progression system and plenty of unlockables that can be customized to fit your personal strategy. Work together to escape, or stalk and sacrifice every Survivor.

This Edition of Dead by Daylight gives you access to a roster of 7 Killers (The Trapper, The Hillbilly, The Wraith, The Nurse, The Hag, The Huntress and The Doctor) and 9 Survivors (Meg Thomas, Claudette Morel, Jake Park, Dwight Fairfield, Ace Visconti, Nea Karlsson, Bill Overbeck, Feng Min and David King). It also includes two cosmetic add-ons packed with outfits for various characters.

item.title: High Seas Hero Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All High Seas Hero Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for High Seas Hero
  • How to Get More High Seas Hero Codes

High Seas Hero will take you to a dangerous post-apocalyptic world where the only more or less safe place is the ocean. Here, you will need to sail on a ship and improve it with various modifications to fight enemies, bosses and other creatures that will get in your way.

To make your survival a little easier, you can redeem High Seas Hero codes. Each of the codes will bring you a bunch of freebies, such as Diamonds, resources, and other consumables that will definitely come in handy, so hurry up.

Updated May 9, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A new code has just been added to High Seas Hero , giving you another way to grab 600 Diamonds. Alongside it, there are several other active codes that offer more Diamonds, Hero’s Marks, Halo Sensors, and even speedups. Rewards vary between codes, so make sure to check them all. The newest addition makes it worth redeeming now if you haven’t already. Check back here often for more code drops.

All High Seas Hero Codes

Working High Seas Hero Codes

  • aQxLi6wb - Redeem this code to get 600 Diamonds. (NEW)
  • RAINNING0404 - Redeem this code to get 600 Diamonds.
  • a6ZxvbFU - Redeem this code to get 600 Diamonds.
  • EIDMUBARAK - Redeem this code to get Hero’s Marks, and Halo Sensers.
  • LADYSDAY0308 - Redeem this code to get 600 Diamonds.
  • azGZtgzJ - Redeem this code to get 600 Diamonds.
  • aiFgxmJL - Redeem this code to get 600 Diamonds.
  • VIP777 - Redeem this code to get 50 Diamonds, five Halo Sensor, and two 5m Universal Speedups.
  • VIP888 - Redeem this code to get 50 Diamonds, five Hero’s Marks, and 500 Coins.

Expired High Seas Hero Codes

  • aiDsigN9 - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Coins.
  • HSHLAUNCH0109 - Redeem this code to get 100 Diamonds, ten Halo Sensors, and 5m Universal Speedup.
  • OUTLANDER777 - Redeem this code to get 600 Diamonds.
  • ABBY01011 - Redeem this code to get ten Halo Sensors.
  • MIMI01021 - Redeem this code to get ten Hero’s Marks.
  • HIGHSEASHEROGO - Redeem this code to get 200 Diamonds.
  • HAPPYHSH777 - Redeem this code to get 200 Diamonds.

Redeeming High Seas Hero codes is an easy and convenient way to quickly replenish your capital and at least temporarily cover your needs. If you are a beginner, rewards from codes will be a great starting bonus and will help you progress in the game much faster.

How to Redeem Codes for High Seas Hero

Redeeming codes in this free mobile game will take you a few clicks, and you can even do it by ignoring the tutorial if you have just started the game. If you don't know or understand how the High Seas Hero code redemption system works, here is a detailed guide:

  • Launch High Seas Hero .
  • Pay attention to the upper left corner of the screen. There will be your avatar. Click on it.
  • This will open the Profile menu. Here, click on the Settings button with the gear icon. It is located in the lower right corner of the screen.
  • After opening Settings, you will see a lot of buttons and options. Among them, find and interact with the Redeem Code button.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Confirm button below it. Now, enter one of the working codes in the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Confirm button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More High Seas Hero Codes

All High Seas Hero codes that have been published and are being posted by the developers can be found on the game's official social media. If you don't want to miss them and stay up to date, here are the links to all these media pages:

  • Official High Seas Hero Discord server.
  • Official High Seas Hero X account.
  • Official High Seas Hero Facebook page.
  • Official High Seas Hero YouTube channel.
  • Official High Seas Hero Instagram account.
  • Official High Seas Hero Reddit community.
  • Official High Seas Hero TikTok account.

High Seas Hero is available on mobile devices.
